languages.text: "Ха, наши головы покрепче ваших тощих черепушек! Не каждый лезет на стену, стоит произойти трансляции в Эмпиреи. Я так вообще — сама стабильность. Учись, пока я жива!"
"Ha, our heads are stronger than your thin little skulls! Not everyone goes into a frenzy as soon as the ship translates to the Empyrean. I am stability incarnate. Learn from my example!"
languages.original_text: "Ха, наши головы покрепче ваших тощих черепушек! Не каждый лезет на стену, стоит произойти трансляции в Эмпиреи. Я так вообще — сама стабильность. Учись, пока я жива!"

traits.locale_text: "Ha, our heads are stronger than your thin little skulls! Not everyone goes into a frenzy as soon as the ship translates to the Empyrean. I am stability incarnate. Learn from my example!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Ha, our heads are stronger than your thin little skulls! Not everyone goes into a frenzy as soon as the ship translates to the Empyrean. I am stability incarnate. Learn from my example!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “哈，我们的脑袋可比你们的小脑瓜结实多了！并不是每个人在这艘船一进入亚空间就会发疯。我就是稳固的化身，和我好好学学吧！”
languages.original_text: "Ha, our heads are stronger than your thin little skulls! Not everyone goes into a frenzy as soon as the ship translates to the Empyrean. I am stability incarnate. Learn from my example!"

traits.locale_text: “哈，我们的脑袋可比你们的小脑瓜结实多了！并不是每个人在这艘船一进入亚空间就会发疯。我就是稳固的化身，和我好好学学吧！”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Ha ! Nos têtes sont bien plus solides que vos petits crânes fragiles ! Tout le monde ne perd pas la tête dès que le vaisseau se transfère dans l'Empyrée. Prenez moi, par exemple : je suis la stabilité incarnée ! »
languages.original_text: "Ha, our heads are stronger than your thin little skulls! Not everyone goes into a frenzy as soon as the ship translates to the Empyrean. I am stability incarnate. Learn from my example!"

traits.locale_text: « Ha ! Nos têtes sont bien plus solides que vos petits crânes fragiles ! Tout le monde ne perd pas la tête dès que le vaisseau se transfère dans l'Empyréen. Prenez moi, par exemple : je suis la stabilité incarnée ! »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «¡Ja, nuestras cabezas son mucho más fuertes que vuestros endebles cráneos! No todo el mundo entra en un frenesí cuando la nave entra en el Empíreo. Yo soy la estabilidad en persona. ¡Sigue mi ejemplo!».
languages.original_text: "Ha, our heads are stronger than your thin little skulls! Not everyone goes into a frenzy as soon as the ship translates to the Empyrean. I am stability incarnate. Learn from my example!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Ja, nuestras cabezas son mucho más fuertes que vuestros endebles cráneos! No todo el mundo entra en un frenesí cuando la nave entra en el Empíreo. Yo soy la estabilidad en persona. ¡Sigue mi ejemplo!».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「はあ、私たちの頭はあなたの薄っぺらくて小さな頭蓋骨より丈夫なの！シップがエンピリアンを映したらすぐに、誰もが正気を失うわけじゃない。私には不滅の肉体がある。見習いなさい！」
languages.original_text: "Ha, our heads are stronger than your thin little skulls! Not everyone goes into a frenzy as soon as the ship translates to the Empyrean. I am stability incarnate. Learn from my example!"

traits.locale_text: 「はあ、私たちの頭はあなたの薄っぺらくて小さな頭蓋骨より丈夫なの！シップがエンピリアンを映したらすぐに、誰もが正気を失うわけじゃない。私には不滅の肉体がある。見習いなさい！」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ha, unsere Köpfe sind stärker als Eure dünnen kleinen Schädel! Nicht jeder bricht in wahnsinnige Raserei aus, sobald das Schiff ins Empyreum springt. Ich bin die fleischgewordene Stabilität. Lernt von meinem Vorbild!"
languages.original_text: "Ha, our heads are stronger than your thin little skulls! Not everyone goes into a frenzy as soon as the ship translates to the Empyrean. I am stability incarnate. Learn from my example!"

traits.locale_text: "Ha, unsere Köpfe sind stärker als Eure dünnen kleinen Schädel! Nicht jeder bricht in wahnsinnige Raserei aus, sobald das Schiff ins Empyreum springt. Ich bin die fleischgewordene Stabilität. Lernt von meinem Vorbild!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "Ha, our heads are stronger than your thin little skulls! Not everyone goes into a frenzy as soon as the ship translates to the Empyrean. I am stability incarnate. Learn from my example!"

languages.text: "Hah! Bizim başlarımız, sizin narin kafataslarınızdan çok daha güçlüdür! Herkes sizin gibi gemisi Gök Diyar'a girince çıldırmıyor. Ben istikrarın beden bulmuş hâliyim mesela. Beni örnek alın!"
languages.original_text: "Ha, our heads are stronger than your thin little skulls! Not everyone goes into a frenzy as soon as the ship translates to the Empyrean. I am stability incarnate. Learn from my example!"

traits.locale_text: "Hah! Bizim beynimiz, sizin minik kafatasınızın alabileceğinden çok daha fazlasıdır! Herkes sizin gibi gemisi Gök Diyar'a girince çıldırmıyor. Ben istikrarın beden bulmuş hâliyim mesela. Beni örnek alın!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
